column3:
よくぞ ここまで…
貴方様こそ紛う事なき勇者
column4:
You have done well... The depth of
your heroism is beyond question.

column3:
我等女神ハイリアの啓示を受け
この試練の祠を創りし導師なり
column4:
We are the ones who prepared
this trial, following a revelation
from the Goddess Hylia.

column3:
剣の試練に打ち克った者こそが
マスターソードの使い手として相応しい
column4:
To the one who has overcome the Trial of
the Sword...you have proven your hand
worthy of the legendary Master Sword.

column3:
厄災討伐を果たすべく勇者が力を得た今
我等はここに その役割を終える
column4:
Now that the hero has gained the power
necessary to combat the Calamity,
our sacred duty has been fulfilled.

column3: 真の輝きを放つマスターソードと共に…
column4:
with the awakened Master Sword,
now boasting its true splendor...

protect the kingdom of Hyrule...
for now and for always...
